title: Haunted
description: Nigel Price has MURDER on his mind.He can run but he cannot hide. Nigel's past has come back to haunt him. The truth is, his past has never left him... it follows him without remorse, catching him at every turn. There is no escape. Regret, guilt, nightmares, despair... these fill his every waking hour and disturb his sleepless nights.Take a trip inside Nigel's mind, in this dark, psychological thriller with a paranormal twist.
author: Maria Savva
